resources.string:
We have included commonly used utility functions in this library that are listed below, we will keep adding up more functions at the same place. 

1. Mashmallow permissions. 
2. Camera and Gallery image picker. 
3. Input fields data validation. 
4. Toast & Log messages. 
5. Close keyboard on outside touch of edit text fields. 
6. Non Swipeable ViewPager. 
7. Square ImageView / RelativeLayout / ViewPager. 
8. Square ImageView / RelativeLayout / ViewPager. 
9. Time & Date Conversion methods. 
10. Zoomable image view 

 many more common utility methods coming soonâ€¦
